CHAPTER 1248 Requirements for Design, Improvements and Reservations

1248.01General improvements.

1248.02Street and highway criteria.

1248.03Storm water management and erosion control.

1248.04Water facilities.

1248.07Sidewalks and curbs.

1248.08Utilities.

CROSS REFERENCES

Minimum standards for boundary surveys, monumentation – see Ohio R.C. 4733.37.03

Institute of Transportation Engineers (ITE) Trip Generation Manual

Flood hazard prevention – see B. & H. Ch. 1448

Zoning districts – see P. & Z. Chap. 1264

City of Springboro Standard Construction Drawings and Specifications

Tree Authority – see ADMIN. Chap. 280
